RateCard.name: RateCard
RateCard.description: Represents the rules used to rate the consumption of a group of resources within a product. Usage of a resource is billed at a specified rate if the user consumes more than their allowance for a time period.

EffectiveFrom.description: Date and time when the rate card becomes effective.

EffectiveTo.description: Date and time until when the rate card remains effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.
